# Hunger (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Doresain]] , [[Incabulos]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You gain a bite attack. If you are Small, your bite attack deals 1d4 points of damage; Medium, 1d6; or Large, 1d8. You are proficient with your bite, and considered armed. If you already have a natural bite attack, use the higher of the two damage values. This is considered a secondary natural attack.

**Hunger Domain Spells**

**1 [[Ghoul Light (Spell)|Ghoul Light]]:** Light provides turn resistance.

**2** **[[Ghoul Glyph (Spell)|Ghoul Glyph]]****:** Glyph wards area, paralyzes victims.

**3** **[[Ghoul Gesture (Spell)|Ghoul Gesture]]****:** Ray paralyzes target.

**4** **[[Enervation (Spell)|Enervation]]****:** Subject gains 1d4 negative levels.

**5 [[Ghoul Gauntlet (Spell)|Ghoul Gauntlet]]:** Convert victim to a ghoul under your control.

**6** **[[Eyes of the King (Spell)|Eyes of the King]]****:** Summon fiendish dire bats.

**7** **[[Field of Ghouls (Spell)|Field of Ghouls]]****:** Transform dying creatures into ghouls.

**8** **[[Bite of the King (Spell)|Bite of the King]]****:** Swallow enemies whole.

**9** **[[Energy Drain (Spell)|Energy Drain]]****:** Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.
